chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
server: nid
clients: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (server \notin clients)
Huniq: is_true (uniq clients)
n: Equality.sort nat_eqType

Goal:
n \in clients -> n \in nodes

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
uniq = fun T : eqType => fix uniq (s : seq T) : bool := match s with | [::] => true | x :: s' => (x \notin s') && uniq s' end : forall T : eqType, seq T -> bool Arguments uniq {T} _%seq_scope
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
nodes = [:: server] ++ clients : seq nid
nid = nat : Set
Notation seq := list
allP : reflect {in ?s, forall x : ?T, ?a x} (all ?a ?s) where ?T : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType |- eqType] ?a : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType |- pred ?T] ?s : [server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \notin clients Huniq : uniq clients n : nat_eqType |- seq ?T]
client_not_server : forall n : nat_eqType, n \in clients -> (n == server) = false
Record protocol : Type := Protocol { nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid; plab : Ordered.sort Label; coh : cohpred nodes; snd_trans : seq (send_trans coh); rcv_trans : seq (receive_trans coh); snd_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.snd_tags snd_trans)); rcv_uniq : is_true (uniq (Protocols.rcv_tags rcv_trans)) } Arguments Protocols.Protocol [nodes]%function_scope _ [coh] [snd_trans rcv_trans]%seq_scope
all_hooks_fire = fun (h : hooks) (l : Label) (st : nat_ordType) (s : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (msg : seq nat) (to : nid) => forall (z : nat_ordType) (lc : Label) (hk : hook_type), Some hk = find (z, lc, (l, st)) h -> lc \in dom s -> l \in dom s -> hk (getLocal n (getStatelet s lc)) (getLocal n (getStatelet s l)) msg to : hooks -> Label -> nat_ordType -> union_mapUMC Label dstatelet -> nid -> seq nat -> nid -> Prop Arguments all_hooks_fire _ _ _ _ _ _%seq_scope
addn0 = fun n : nat => [eta eqP] ((fun _evar_0_ : (fun n0 : nat => is_true (n0 + 0 == n0)) 0 => (nat_ind (fun n0 : nat => n0 + 0 == n0) _evar_0_)^~ n) (eqxx 0) (fun n0 : nat => id)) : right_id 0 addn
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
bigop.mem_index_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in bigop.index_iota m n) = (m <= i < n)
mem_iota : forall (m n : nat) (i : nat_eqType), (i \in iota m n) = (m <= i < m + n)
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
disj_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V), (forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \notin supp s2) -> disj_spec s1 s2 true
subnKC : forall m n : nat, m <= n -> m + (n - m) = n
Variant disj_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (s1 s2 : finMap K V) : bool -> Type := disj_true : (forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \notin supp s2) -> disj_spec s1 s2 true | disj_false : forall x : K, x \in supp s1 -> x \in supp s2 -> disj_spec s1 s2 false Arguments disj_spec [K] [V]%type_scope _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments disj_true [K] [V]%type_scope [s1 s2] _%function_scope Arguments disj_false [K] [V]%type_scope [s1 s2 x]
Record finMap (K : ordType) (V : Type) : Type := FinMap { seq_of : seq (K * V); _ : is_true (sorted ord [seq key i | i <- seq_of]) } Arguments finMap _ _%type_scope Arguments FinMap [K] [V]%type_scope [seq_of]%seq_scope
div.modnB : forall m n d : nat, 0 < d -> n <= m -> div.modn (m - n) d = (div.modn m d < div.modn n d) * d + div.modn m d - div.modn n d
valid_true : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U), valid f1 -> valid f2 -> (forall x : K, x \in dom f1 -> x \notin dom f2) -> validUn_spec f1 f2 true
getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap
rot = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T) => drop n s ++ take n s : forall T : Type, nat -> seq T -> seq T Arguments rot {T}%type_scope _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
rot_to_arc : forall (T : eqType) (p : seq T) (x y : T), uniq p -> x \in p -> y \in p -> x != y -> rot_to_arc_spec p x y
leq = fun m n : nat => m - n == 0 : nat -> nat -> bool Arguments leq (_ _)%nat_scope
subSn : forall m n : nat, m <= n -> n.+1 - m = (n - m).+1
iota = fix iota (m n : nat) {struct n} : seq nat := match n with | 0 => [::] | n'.+1 => m :: iota m.+1 n' end : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments iota (_ _)%nat_scope
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
leq_addr : forall m n : nat, n <= n + m
subnDA : forall m n p : nat, n - (m + p) = n - m - p
leq_subLR : forall m n p : nat, (m - n <= p) = (m <= n + p)
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = getLocal n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
bigop.index_iota = fun m n : nat => iota m (n - m) : nat -> nat -> seq nat Arguments bigop.index_iota (_ _)%nat_scope
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
subn1 : forall n : nat, n - 1 = n.-1
Variant validUn_spec (K : ordType) (V : Type) (U : union_map_class K V) (f1 f2 : U) : bool -> Type := valid_false1 : ~~ valid f1 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_false2 : ~~ valid f2 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_false3 : forall k : K, k \in dom f1 -> k \in dom f2 -> validUn_spec f1 f2 false | valid_true : valid f1 -> valid f2 ->...-> validUn_spec f1 f2 true Arguments validUn_spec [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ _ _%bool_scope Arguments valid_false1 [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1] Arguments valid_false2 [K] [V]%type_scope [U] _ [f2] Arguments valid_false3 [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1 f2 k] Arguments valid_true [K] [V]%type_scope [U f1 f2] _ _ _%function_scope
send_safe : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes), Transitions.send_trans coh -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop
mem_next : forall (T : eqType) (p : seq T) (x : T), (next p x \in p) = (x \in p)
Actions.step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
a_step_other : forall (W : world) (this : nid) (V : Type) (a : Actions.action W V this) (l : Label) (s1 s2 : state) (r : V) (n : nat_eqType) (pf : Actions.a_safe a s1), this != n -> Actions.a_step pf s2 r -> getLocal n (getStatelet s1 l) = getLocal n (getStatelet s2 l)
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
splitPr : forall (T : eqType) (p : seq T) (x : T), x \in p -> splitr x p
addSnnS : forall m n : nat, m.+1 + n = m + n.+1
Transitions.s_step_coh_t : forall nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid, cohpred nodes -> nat -> forall send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop, Transitions.send_step_t send_safe -> Prop
subn_gt0 : forall m n : nat, (0 < n - m) = (m < n)

intros.
intros Hin_clients.
apply Hnin in Hin_clients.
contradiction.
